lockin.title: LockIn
lockin.giveUpMessage: You'll lose your current streak if you give up now. Are you sure?
lockin.photoTaskDesc: Verify your focus with before/after photos
lockin.startFirst: Start a LockIn to see your history
lockin.earnScreenTimeDesc: by completing exercises. The more you do, the more time you earn!
lockin.fullBodyVisible: Make sure your full body is visible
lockin.firstRunDescription: Complete exercises to earn minutes you can spend on your favourite apps. The more you exercise, the more time you earn!
lockin.rewardPlankDesc: Earn {{rate}} min per second. Minimum {{min}}s to earn. {{bonus}} bonus for holding {{bonusTime}}s+!
lockin.rewardRepsDesc: Earn {{rate}} min per rep. Minimum {{min}} reps to earn. {{bonus}} bonus for {{bonusReps}}+ reps!
lockin.minimumPlankRequired: You need to hold for at least {{seconds}}s to earn time.
lockin.minimumRepsRequired: You need at least {{count}} reps to earn time.
lockin.holdAtLeast: Hold for at least {{seconds}}s to earn time
lockin.doAtLeast: Do at least {{count}} reps to earn time
lockin.infoRewardPlank: {{rate}} min per second. Min {{min}}s to earn. {{bonus}} bonus at {{bonusTime}}s!
lockin.infoRewardReps: {{rate}} min per rep. Min {{min}} reps to earn. {{bonus}} bonus at {{bonusReps}} reps!

pushups.name: Press-ups
instructions: Position your phone to see your full body from the side
Get into press-up position with arms extended
Lower your chest to the ground
Push back up to complete a rep
1.1x bonus after 20 reps!

squats.name: Squats
instructions: Position your phone to see your full body from the side
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Squat down until thighs are parallel to ground
Stand back up to complete a rep
1.1x bonus after 20 reps!

plank.name: Plank
instructions: Position your phone to see your full body from the side
Get into plank position with body straight
Hold the position as long as you can
Keep your hips level - no sagging or raising
1.1x bonus after 30 seconds!

jumpingJacks.name: Star Jumps
instructions: Position your phone to see your full body
Stand with feet together, arms at sides
Jump while spreading legs and raising arms
Jump back to starting position
1.1x bonus after 30 reps!

lunges.name: Lunges
instructions: Position your phone to see your full body from the side
Stand tall with feet hip-width apart
Step forward and lower until front knee is at 90¬∞
Push back to standing position
1.1x bonus after 15 reps!

crunches.name: Crunches
instructions: Position your phone to see your full body from the side
Lie on your back with knees bent
Curl your shoulders up towards your knees
Lower back down with control
1.1x bonus after 20 reps!

shoulderPress.name: Shoulder Press
instructions: Position your phone to see your upper body
Hold weights at shoulder height
Press arms straight up overhead
Lower back to shoulder height
1.1x bonus after 15 reps!

legRaises.name: Leg Raises
instructions: Position your phone to see your full body from the side
Lie flat on your back, legs straight
Raise legs up towards the ceiling
Lower legs back down with control
1.1x bonus after 15 reps!

highKnees.name: High Knees
instructions: Position your phone to see your full body
Stand tall, ready to run in place
Drive knees up above hip level
Alternate legs quickly
1.1x bonus after 40 reps!

pullUps.name: Pull-ups
instructions: Position your phone to see your body from the side
Hang from the bar with arms extended
Pull yourself up until chin is over the bar
Lower back down with control
1.15x bonus after 10 reps!

wallSit.name: Wall Sit
instructions: Position your phone to see your full body from the side
Lean against a wall with feet shoulder-width apart
Slide down until knees are at 90 degrees
Hold the position - thighs parallel to ground
1.1x bonus after 45 seconds!

sidePlank.name: Side Plank
instructions: Position your phone to see your full body from the front
Lie on your side, prop yourself up on your elbow
Lift your hips off the ground
Keep your body in a straight line
1.1x bonus after 30 seconds!

welcome.title: Welcome to LockIn
welcome.description: Your personal companion for building healthier digital habits. We'll help you stay focused and make the most of your screen time.

orb.title: Your Health Orb
orb.description: This orb reflects your digital wellness. It glows green when you're doing great, and shifts to warmer colours when it might be time for a break.

stats.title: Track Your Progress
stats.description: Keep an eye on your streak, daily screen time, and how you compare to your weekly average. Small improvements add up to big changes.

quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.description: Tap the lightning button at the bottom right for instant access to blocking features, schedules, and focus mode. Everything you need, one tap away.

schedules.title: Smart Schedules
schedules.description: Create automatic blocking schedules for work, study, or rest time. Set it once and let the app handle the rest.

appUsage.title: App Insights
appUsage.description: See which apps are using most of your time. Understanding your habits is the first step to improving them.

ready.title: You're All Set!
ready.description: Start by blocking a few distracting apps and watch your focus improve. We're here to support you on this journey.

intro.title: Blocking Controls
intro.description: This is your command centre for managing distractions. Block apps, set schedules, and define daily limits all from one place.

focusSession.title: Focus Sessions
focusSession.description: Need to concentrate right now? Start a focus session to block distracting apps for a set duration. You can even require completing a task before unlocking.

schedules.title: Scheduled Blocking
schedules.description: Set up recurring schedules for times when you need to stay focused. Perfect for work hours, study sessions, or bedtime.

appLimits.title: Daily App Limits
appLimits.description: Not ready to fully block an app? Set a daily time limit instead. Once you reach it, the app is blocked for the rest of the day.

intro.title: Your Weekly Report
intro.description: Get a complete picture of your screen time habits. Track total hours, daily averages, and identify patterns in your usage.

weeklyView.title: Week by Week
weeklyView.description: Swipe left and right to compare different weeks. See your progress over time and celebrate your improvements.

calendar.title: Usage Calendar
calendar.description: The calendar heatmap shows your daily usage at a glance. Darker colours indicate more screen time.

appBreakdown.title: App Breakdown
appBreakdown.description: See exactly which apps are taking up your time. Use these insights to make informed decisions about what to limit.

intro.title: Digital Detox
intro.description: Sometimes you need a complete break from your phone. Start a detox session to block all distracting apps and reconnect with the world around you.

timer.title: Set Your Duration
timer.description: Choose how long you want to go phone-free. Start with shorter sessions and gradually increase as you build the habit.

unlock.title: Stay Committed
unlock.description: Once you start a detox session, it runs until completion. This helps you stay committed to your goal without temptation.

intro.title: Your Profile
intro.description: Manage your account, view achievements, and customise your settings. Everything about you in one place.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.description: Unlock badges as you build better habits. Each achievement represents a milestone in your digital wellness journey.

defaultBlocks.title: Default Settings
defaultBlocks.description: Set your default blocked apps and time limits. These will be pre-selected when creating new schedules, saving you time.

phrases: Your journey to digital wellness starts now
Building better habits, one step at a time
Reclaim your time, reclaim your life
Small steps lead to big changes
Your future self will thank you
Master your phone, master your life
Less screen time, more real time

step2.showCurrentState:
Show the current state of your task.
This proves you did real work!
step2.tipsContent: Show the mess/task clearly. Good lighting helps. This will be compared with your "after" photo!

buttons.completeToUnlock: Complete task + take "after" photo to unlock

focusMode.title: Focus Mode
focusMode.subtitle: Block distractions and stay focused
focusMode.whyDescription: Block distracting apps and stay productive. Focus sessions help you concentrate on what matters most.
